name: Logic Dash
description:
Game created on a Secret Santa 2022 Gamejam. Huge thanks to Sheepolution, Kya and Will for making such a incredible jam!

Here are some words for my giftee:

"I'm really glad that I could prepare a game specially for you! I went for the climates of Dustforce and Celeste from all the games you've mentioned and tried to focus on a mechanic that is hard to master, but really satisfying when you learn it and I believe I actually achieved it! Hopefully, you will enjoy the game as it's what's most important to me. Merry Christmas to you <3"

Story:

A totally normal squirrel found a book in the forest one day. Upon reading it, he dashed in his intelligence and understood all the laws of physics and math which enabled him to learn teleportation!

Unfortunately, gaining another levels of realization has it's negative consequences...

Credits:

Game made by Manus. 

Huge thanks to: 

  • Kyrkke for logo and intro art
  • 7withoutthe11 for music
  • Elthen for squirrel: https://elthen.itch.io/2d-pixel-art-squirrel-sprites
  • Kya, Ehon, Miłosz, zlago and Christina for being awesome testers and giving useful feedback!
Controls:

Movement - A/D or LeftArrow/RightArrow

Aim - Mouse

Throw/Dash/Respawn - Space

Summon - R
